data.title: Crypto Whale Faces Significant Losses Amid Leveraged Positions
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, a prominent cryptocurrency investor known as the '100% Win Rate Whale' has experienced substantial losses on leveraged positions since October 14. The investor, identified by the wallet address 0xc2a, currently holds over $310 million in long positions, with unrealized losses expanding to $5.84 million. Earlier today, the account briefly returned to profitability.

The investor's Bitcoin position, leveraged 13 times, is valued at approximately $114 million with an entry price of $110,123.0, showing an unrealized loss of $683,900. The Ethereum position, leveraged 10 times and valued at around $95 million, was opened at $3,873.66, resulting in a loss of $119,200. Additionally, a Solana position, also leveraged 10 times and valued at about $110 million, was opened at $198.4364, with losses amounting to $4.32 million.

Notably, the whale has placed a limit order for 15,000 ETH at $3,800, valued at $57 million, awaiting execution.

data.title: A whale's $107 million long BTC position with 40x leverage was only $500 away from the liquidation price.
data.description: According to on-chain analyst Ember's monitoring, a whale (0xf35...fb59) went long on $107 million worth of BTC with 40x leverage 4 hours ago, with a liquidation price of $109,000, approximately $500 away from the current price. In addition, this whale also went long on $20 million worth of TRUMP and $15 million worth of ENA, with liquidation prices close to the current price.

data.title: JPMorgan Chase has launched a tokenized private equity fund on its proprietary blockchain.
data.description: According to the Wall Street Journal, JPMorgan Chase has launched a tokenized private equity fund on its own blockchain.

data.title: Binance Launches Lorenzo Protocol Trading Competition with BANK Token Rewards
data.description:
According to the announcement from Binance, the platform is set to launch the Lorenzo Protocol Trading Competition on Binance Alpha, offering participants the opportunity to earn BANK token rewards. The competition will run from 2025-10-30 12:00 (UTC) to 2025-11-13 12:00 (UTC). During this period, users can trade Lorenzo Protocol (BANK) through their Binance Wallet (Keyless) or via Binance Alpha to qualify for exclusive token rewards. Participants will be ranked based on their total purchase volume of BANK tokens during the promotion period, with the top 8,300 users sharing a total of 5,893,000 BANK tokens equally, amounting to 710 BANK per user.

Eligibility for participation requires users to trade BANK tokens exclusively through Binance Wallet (Keyless) or Binance Alpha, as third-party dApp transactions are excluded. Only cumulative purchases will be considered, and selling is not included in the competition. There is no cap on trading volume for participants, and transactions related to token bridging are not eligible. To participate, users must update their Binance App to the latest version, create a Binance Wallet (Keyless), and ensure it is backed up. After the promotion period ends, rankings will be automatically calculated, and eligible winners can claim their rewards on the event page.

Binance emphasizes that only users from qualified regions who complete account verification (KYC) and hold an active Binance Wallet are eligible. The platform reserves the right to disqualify users involved in dishonest behavior or tampering with program code. Binance may amend or vary the activity terms without prior notice, including canceling or extending the competition. Users are advised to review the Terms of Use and Risk Warning, as digital asset prices can be volatile, and investments may result in losses. Binance Alpha features emerging digital assets with unique characteristics, and their inclusion does not imply future listing on Binance Exchange.

data.title: Binance: The threshold for the BANK token airdrop is 240 Alpha Credits.
data.description: Binance announced that users holding at least 240 Binance Alpha Points can claim an airdrop of 354 BANK tokens. First come, first served. If the event continues, the score threshold will automatically decrease by 5 points every five minutes. Please note that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm their claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours, otherwise they will be considered to have forfeited the airdrop. In addition, Binance will launch the Lorenzo Protocol trading competition with a total prize pool of 5,893,000 BANK. Only cumulative purchases during the event period will be counted (sales will not be counted).

data.title: Michael Saylor's personal holdings of 17,732 BTC have yielded a paper profit of $1.77 billion.
data.description: According to BitcoinTreasuries.NET, Strategy Executive Chairman Michael Saylor's personal holdings of 17,732 BTC currently have a floating profit of $1.77 billion.

data.title: JPMorgan Advances Private Equity Tokenization on Blockchain
data.description: According to Foresight News, JPMorgan has successfully tokenized private equity funds on its proprietary blockchain. The bank is planning to launch a platform for the tokenization of alternative investment funds by 2026.

data.title: Binance Alpha Launchhes Second Wave of Lorenzo Protocol (BANK) Airdrops
data.description: Binance announced on X that Binance Alpha has launched the second wave of Lorenzo Protocol (BANK) airdrop rewards.Users with at least 240 Binance Alpha Points can claim an airdrop of 354 BANK tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. If the reward pool is not fully distributed, the score threshold will automatically decrease by 5 points every 5 minutes.Claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm their claim on the Alpha Events page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be deemed that users have given up claiming the airdrop.In addition, Binance will be launching a trading competition with a reward pool of 5,893,000 BANK. Only cumulative purchases count during the campaign; selling is excluded. Details will be announced separately.

data.title: Binance Alpha Launches Second Wave of Lorenzo Protocol (BANK) Airdrop Rewards
data.description: Key Takeaways:Users with 240+ Alpha Points can claim 354 BANK tokens on a first-come, first-served basis.The Alpha Points threshold decreases by 5 points every 5 minutes if the reward pool is not fully distributed.Claiming consumes 15 Alpha Points and must be confirmed within 24 hours.A BANK trading competition with a 5,893,000 BANK reward pool is also launching soon.Binance Alpha has launched the second wave of airdrop rewards for Lorenzo Protocol (BANK), offering eligible users the chance to claim 354 BANK tokens using their Binance Alpha Points.Users holding at least 240 Alpha Points can claim the airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis via the Alpha Events page. If the reward pool is not fully distributed, the point requirement will automatically drop by 5 points every 5 minutes, increasing accessibility as the campaign progresses.Please note that each claim consumes 15 Alpha Points, and users must confirm their claim within 24 hours â€” otherwise, the system will consider the claim forfeited.In addition to the airdrop, Binance Alpha will soon host a Lorenzo Protocol (BANK) trading competition featuring a total reward pool of 5,893,000 BANK tokens. Only cumulative purchases will count toward rankings; sales are excluded.Further details, including competition rules and timelines, will be announced on the Alpha Events page.

data.title: Bessant: The Fed is living in the past; its predictive models have failed.
data.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Bessant praised the Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates by 25 basis points, but also pointed out that the Fed's skepticism about further rate cuts this year indicates the institution urgently needs major reforms. Bessant stated that he will conduct a second round of interviews with candidates for Fed chair in early December to replace Powell, allowing Trump to make an appointment before Christmas. Bessant said, "The current Fed is stuck in the past. Their inflation forecasts this year have been very poor, and their models have failed." (Jinshi)

data.title: Gate Web3 BountyDrop launches RubberVerseX airdrop event today.
data.description: According to the official announcement, Gate Web3's BountyDrop launched its RubberVerseX airdrop event today. Users can participate in the task through the BountyDrop module on the Gate Web3 App's "Discover" page. Gate will randomly select 1,000 participants from all those who complete the task to share $15,000 Saibots. In addition, Gate Meme Go is running a zero-fee trading extravaganza from 18:00 on October 24th to 18:00 on November 9th (UTC+8), with a total prize pool of $20,000. The event features multiple reward mechanisms: New user benefits include a 5 USDT bonus for the first 1,000 users who complete their first transaction of at least $1,000; zero transaction fees for any token traded on the Gate Layer chain; and transaction ranking rewards, with participants earning at least $1,500 in cumulative transaction volume to share in the prize pool, with a maximum reward of $50 per person. The top 50 users by transaction volume will also receive a fixed reward ranging from $5 to $50. BountyDrop is a dedicated earning activity section on the Gate Web3 discovery page, where users can complete simple tasks for a chance to win rewards or participate in a lottery for airdropped tokens.

data.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary Comments on Federal Reserve Rate Cut
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, U.S. Treasury Secretary Besant expressed appreciation for the Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates by 25 basis points. However, Besant was not satisfied with the language used in the announcement.

The Treasury Secretary anticipates a robust rebound in employment growth. Besant also believes that next year will see simultaneous prosperity for Main Street, representing the general public and real economy sectors, and Wall Street, symbolizing the capital markets.

data.description:
Large investors are choosing to sell their holdings, and it could be tied to the lack of conviction in Bitcoin's placement on the market.

data.title: Whale Resumes Ethereum Purchases After 11-Month Hiatus
data.description: According to Foresight News, blockchain monitoring service Lookonchain has reported that a significant Ethereum investor, identified by the wallet address starting with 0x1b57, has resumed activity after an 11-month break. The investor recently acquired 5,580 ETH, valued at approximately $21.75 million.

data.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary Announces Upcoming Interviews for Federal Reserve Chair
data.description: According to BlockBeats, U.S. Treasury Secretary Besant has announced that the second round of interviews for the Federal Reserve Chair position is set to commence soon. The selection of the next candidate for the Federal Reserve Chair is expected to be finalized before Christmas.

data.title: US Treasury Secretary Bessant: A candidate for the next Federal Reserve Chair may be selected before Christmas.
data.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Bessant: The second round of interviews for the next Federal Reserve Chair is about to begin, and the candidate may be determined before Christmas. (Jinshi)

data.title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF, IBIT, transferred 794.43 BTC, worth approximately $87.44 million, to Coinbase.
data.description: According to Onchain Lens, BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF IBIT transferred 794.43 BTC, worth approximately $87.44 million, to Coinbase in the past hour. Simultaneously, the fund also transferred 48.36 ETH, worth approximately $188,800.
